title: Smart Outfit Assistant
description: Helping you solve outfit problems easily
footer: © 2023 Smart Outfit Assistant - Providing simple and practical outfit suggestions for you

placeholder.no_selected_items: Please select items from above to add here
placeholder.your_items_here: Your selected items will appear here
placeholder.waiting_for_match: Please select items, occasions and seasons, then click 'Generate outfit'
placeholder.waiting_message: We will recommend suitable outfit combinations based on your selections to help you easily solve your clothing matching problems

messages.minimum_items: For better matching results, please select at least 2 or more items, such as a top and bottom combination
messages.analyzing: Analyzing your selected items, occasions and seasons
messages.sorry_message: Sorry, we couldn't find any outfits that perfectly match your current selection.
messages.suggestion_more_items: Select more clothing types (e.g., top + bottom)
messages.suggestion_different_combo: Try different occasion or season combinations
messages.fallback_description: No exact matches found. Here are some approximate outfit suggestions based on your selection.
messages.image_error: Image cannot be displayed at the moment
